channel.title: Deltascape NPC Dialogue Help?
channel.description:
A little help with making an npc talk to me correctly.
Lets say I wanted to make a new dialogue case for the Lumbridge guide (2244)
I scroll down to the npcdialogue and add the correct cases in 135 (Choice136) 137 138
Then I put the npc dialogue cases in.
But when I log on it only goes to the last case for that npc 138:
Any fix for that
So it would be like my cases
135:Hi want to learn stuff?
136: Yes, No
137: Ok
138: First start off
It would just go straight to the "First start off"

item.title: Deltascape NPC Dialogue Help?
item.dc:creator: @moparwha moparwha
item.description:
@moparwha wrote:

A little help with making an npc talk to me correctly.

Lets say I wanted to make a new dialogue case for the Lumbridge guide (2244)

I scroll down to the npcdialogue and add the correct cases in 135 (Choice136) 137 138

Then I put the npc dialogue cases in.

But when I log on it only goes to the last case for that npc 138:

Any fix for that

So it would be like my cases

135:Hi want to learn stuff?

136: Yes, No

137: Ok

138: First start off

It would just go straight to the “First start off”

Read full topic
